title: UX/UI Designer to create Clickable Prototypes
job_overview:
This is an exciting opportunity to partner with our Catholic group coaching company in a UI/UX capacity.

About Our Company
We are a faith-based coaching organization dedicated to helping individuals grow in their spiritual journey and personal development through the lens of Catholic teachings. Our mission is to provide guidance, community, and resources that help people deepen their relationship with God while achieving their personal and professional goals.

Project Overview
We're seeking a UX/UI designer to join our mission-driven team. We need someone who can build a elegantly simple prototype. This role offers the opportunity to make a meaningful impact by being at the beginning stages shaping a start-ups future. 

Your role: Become the artist of the company that leads the user to their magic Upgrade to see actual infont on the app. 

What We're Looking For
1. High-Fidelity Feature Grabs that highlights key functionality so users and stakeholders instantly grasp product value. Commonly used on SaaS landing pages to zoom in on specific features. Example (Realm - scroll to "Main Features" section of landing page). 
2. User Personas that builds a shared understanding of the core user and their goals. A Living, breathing document to communicate to future teaUpgrade to see actual infombers, investors etc. 
3. User Flow: In-Class Experience that covers everything a user can do during a meeting e.g., listening, raising hand, and sending messages. Core to the product’s unique value proposition.  
4. 1-Page UX Documentation that captures rationale behind design decisions—can be useful for investor conversations and aligning future collaborators. 
5. Clickable Prototype of In-Class User Flow that demonstrates a key slice of the user experience for pitching, feedback, or early testing. 
6. Figma design file   

What We Offer
Collaborative partnership with a mission-driven organization
Opportunity to contribute to meaningful work that impacts lives
Fair compensation for quality work
Flexibility in timeline and communication
Clear brand direction and messaging guidelines
Supportive team environment rooted in Catholic values

Next Steps
If this opportunity resonates with you and aligns with your values and expertise, I would love to discuss the project further.

Please respond with:
1. Links to previous example Clickable Prototype
2. A video introduction giving me:
a) the background to one of the clickable prototypes, your method and the steps leading up to the results/lesson. how long did it take you? Mistakes?
b) Your methodology/approach for a clickable prototype for a catholic therapy company

If it's a good fit, we can set up a time to talk and I'll share our brand guidelines with you. 

Blessings,
Joe
